text: A warehouse district somewhere in the Tokyo metropolitan area.
Several shady districts had formed due to the collapse of the boundaries between humans and demons.
And in one of those, a secret battle between those living in darkness was fought this night as well.

name: Monster
text: 『Uargh!!』
A sword flashed in the darkness.
With kodachi in each hand, a lone female ninja clad in a Taima-Suit was driving back a monster.
You're not making this easy for me. I thought I had struck you down quite a few times already.

name: Monster
text: 『...That's because I'm desperate. I may have been created, but that doesn't mean I'll just lie down and disappear for others' convenience.』
The monster, a strange one-eyed being in a top hat and a black suit, answered bitterly.
Maybe because it had been wounded in the fight against the woman, but the monster's body had several large cracks through which its demonic energy was leaking.
Then how about you fight back a bit? If you just keep running away, it's not really exciting for me either.

name: Monster
text: 『...I do not like to fight. But I do have a little confidence in my ability to escape.』
Hehe, that's right... That was your power, wasn't it? You peeping tom.
To "peer into the minds of others" with that giant eye of yoursーWhat a vile and despicable power.
Is it also thanks to your power that you're able to narrowly escape my blade?

name: Monster
text: 『...In truth, it works a little differently, but I also won't deny it.』
What the monster was reading was not people's minds, but "people's wishes."
But it was also true that it was using its power to continuously escape the woman's deadly attacks.
Hmm... Still, one way or the other, you're finished.
Even if you can read my attacks, you can't escape any longer with those wounds.
The female ninja had a point.
Although it had avoided any fatal injuries, the monster's wounds were still deep. It already wasn't able to properly move.

name: Monster
text: 『Yes, it is just as you said... It looks like I have to "prepare" myself soon...』
Either to prepare to be struck down, or prepare to make its last standー
Wounded and kneeling on the ground, a powerful demonic energy rose from the body of the monster.
Ohh, interesting...
The woman faintly twisted her lips and readied her blades, however...
*Bang!!*
A bullet was fired from the darknessー
In the blink of an eye, the woman had sensed and managed to evade it with extraordinary reflexes.

name: Thug
text: Haaahn!? Don't underestimate us, you bitch!!

name: Gangster
text: That "Book Djinn" is ours, the Kuron-kai's prey!!!
Tough-looking men, gun-wielding thugs and mercenaries, appeared out of the darkness.
It was clearly a group belonging to an underground organization.
The Kuron-kai...? One of the organizations from Amidahara...

name: Woman
text: Oh, you've heard of us? Well, a lot has happened, so now we're expanding our influence over here as well♪

name: Gangster
text: Meifeng nee-san!!
In answer to the female ninja's puzzled muttering, a bewitchingly beautiful woman appeared from out of the group of thugs.
She was not only beautiful, but also could instantly be recognized as a skilled fighter by her impeccable poise.
Judging by the awe and admiration the thugs showed, this womanーthis Meifeng, was most likely the leader of the group.
...Your prey?

name: Meifeng
text: Indeed♪ And you, are you a Taimanin? Well, not that I care whose bitch you are.

name: Meifeng
text: If you try to interfere with our businessー Hey!! You lot!!

name: Gangster
text: Yes, nee-san!!!
In response to Meifeng's order, the thugs surrounded the female ninja.
Guns, blades, and murderous stares were aimed at her from all directions.
Some of the men ogled at the female ninja's crotch and breasts, their eyes gleaming with animalistic desires.
Hmm...
But the woman was completely unfazed and turned her gaze slightly to the side.
『I do have a little confidence in my ability to escape.』
True to its word, the monster that was supposed to be cowering there had already disappeared before anyone noticed.
...Oh well. Let's get rid of this little disturbance and then I'll continue with my mission.
Senzaki was known as one of the most crime-ridden cities within the metropolitan area.
It had once been developed as a commuter town for Tokyo. However, since the city center had turned into a slum because of the increasing number of war refugees,
this caused an influx of residents of the Devildom and criminal organizations to flow into the city, and had turned the downtown area into a hub for illegal commerce and entertainment.
Because of its trade port, the city was a strategically important base for various organizations, and there were frequent violent conflicts.
And on this evening.
There was a young girl timidly walking through this treacherous and disreputable district.

name: Shinohara Mari
text: Ohh～ Walking alone through a place like this still makes me nervous...
It was Shinohara Mari, a hard-working Taimanin and a student at Gosha Academy.
This evening, Mari was on an undercover mission as part of her practical field training.
Her mission was simple: To deliver a message to an agent who had already infiltrated the city.
The mission was intended to let the students, who still lacked the skills and experience as Taimanin, familiarize themselves with the atmosphere of a shady town like this.
And as of this moment, Mari was on her way home after successfully completing her mission.
She was walking down one of the perilous streets, excited about completing her first undercover mission.

name: Mari
text: But they really are amazing... Fuma-kun and the others are always doing missions in a city like this...
Mari looked around the street illuminated by bewitching neon lights, muttering quietly to herself.
With "Fuma and the others," Mari meant Fuma, Hebiko, and Shikanosuke, all Taimanin students in the same year as her.
The activities of their Independent Commando Unit had lately become the subject of quite a bit of gossip among the students of Gosha.

name: Mari
text: (No, not in a city like this, but in much more dangerous ones...)
Senzaki was also quite dangerous, but compared to "real" cities of darkness like Tokyo Kingdom or Yomihara, order was still more or less maintained.
The Independent Commando Unit led by Fuma had infiltrated those cities of darkness, and had achieved several remarkable results.
As a Taimanin student of about the same age, Mari couldn't help but feel inspired.

name: Mari
text: And not only Fuma-kun, but also Hebiko-chan and Shikanosuke-kun...

name: Mari
text: Yeah!! I also have to do my best to keep up with them...!
Mari clenched her fists and nodded, pumping herself up. But there was also another thought on her mind.

name: Mari
text: (But... can I really be as strong as everyone else...?)
Mari was an excellent student who was also on the student council.
But at the moment, that was the "only" thing she had achieved.
Her grades were excellent, but her practical skills were still somewhat lacking because of her inherent clumsiness.
While her classmates, Fuma and the others, were showing impressive results on their missions, Mari was still stuck on doing "training missions"...

name: Mari
text: (Maybe... no matter how hard I try, I'll never...)
At that moment.

name: Mari
text: Huh? Someone's fighting...?
Passing by a narrow back street, Mari had heard a sound as if someone was arguing.
It was a dangerous and crime-ridden city, so fights were pretty much a daily occurrence, but...
The city's residents did not seem to care about the noise and simply passed by.
For them, it was most likely something trivial that was not worth stopping for. But still...

name: Mari
text: (I-I can't just look the other way. Somebody might get hurt...)
Cautiously, Mari moved deeper down the back street. And thereー

name: Red Oni
text: Hyuk-hyuk-hyuk! What a fool you are da defy me.

name: Demon Dog
text: GRRR...

name: Mari
text: (A-An Oni...!!?)
Mari cowered involuntarily.
Down the street was one of the denizens of darkness that she had learned about in class at the academyーan Oni.
In the darkness of the back street, this member of the fearsome warrior race seemed to be beating someone.

name: Red Oni
text: Stand up already and come with me!! If you don't, I'll hurt you even more!! Hyuk-hyuk-hyuk!

name: Monster
text: 『...I refuse. I have no intention of doing your bidding.』

name: Red Oni
text: Cocky bastard!! Are you talking back da me!!?
The thudding sound of the enraged Red Oni swinging down his pike could be heard.
Following that, a cry of pain came from deep within the darkness.

name: Mari
text: (Eeeeeek!! Wh-What should I do...!?)
The Red Oni seemed to be assaulting not a human, but a monster.
Let's just runaway from here... For the briefest of moments, that thought flashed through Mari's mind.
She might have been a Taimanin, but Mari was still a student.
If it came to a fight, she wasn't very confident that she could win against the Oni, a member of a powerful warrior race.

name: Mari
text: (Ooohhh... b-but I still have to...!!)

name: Mari
text: E-Excuse me... Can you please stop fighting...?
Mari called out timidly.
She was terrified.
But she also couldn't just turn a blind eye when someone... or even something was in need of help.

name: Red Oni
text: Hyuk-hyuk!? Who's this cute little girl!!?

name: Mari
text: H-Hello, I'm Shinohara Mari... Ah, no, my name doesn't really matter right now...

name: Red Oni
text: What's that!? What's that!? If you have something da say, then say it clearly!!

name: Mari
text: Uwahwah...
The Red Oni had turned around and came closer, looking annoyed.

name: Mari
text: (No, I can't be scared...! I have to make sure I get my point across...)

name: Mari
text: E-Excuse me! Can you please stop hurting him...?

name: Mari
text: In exchange, I will pay you...

name: Red Oni
text: Hyuk! Pay me!?

name: Mari
text: (I-If I remember correctly... that's what Fuma-kun said works best...)
Oni were very greedy.
Fuma had said that they were easily swayed by desires and pleasures right in front of their eyes, and that many of them could be bribed.
Mari had secretly eavesdropped on him telling that to his friendsーHebiko and Shikanosuke.

name: Red Oni
text: Hyuk-hyuk-hyuk! You are a clever young lady!!

name: Red Oni
text: Very well, very well. Under certain circumstances, I might be willing da consider your offer.

name: Mari
text: Really!?

name: Mari
text: (Amazing! Fuma-kun was right!)

name: Red Oni
text: ? Did you say something?

name: Mari
text: A-Ah, no, I was just talking to myself... Anyways! Let's see, where's my allowance...
Mari pulled out her purse. However.

name: Mari
text: Aaah!? N-No way... Sorry, I have only 300 yen on me right now...
It was a tragedy. Inside Mari's purse, there was only enough for the train ride home.

name: Mari
text: Uhm... Red Oni-san, will 300 yen be enough?

name: Red Oni
text: Of course it won't!!!

name: Red Oni
text: That boy the last time and now you, are you all making fun of me!? I'll kill you!!!

name: Mari
text: Uwahwah...
